website_summaries.verdict: Handcrafted for a truly rustic look and feel.
pros: A beautiful, handcrafted wooden table with a dark stain
We love the look of the wire-brush finish
Spacious drawer  features an antique brass handle
22 inches wide by 22 inches deep by 22 inches high

customer_reviews.title: Bullseye! This end table is a winner.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, needing an end table to go with an accent chair in my office. I also wanted one with rustic hardwood. This turned out to be an excellent choice, since it matches the Acacia wood in my Erina desk and bookshelf, both also provided through SimpliHome. Again, this item arrived in excellent condition, due to the thorough packing, was easy to assemble, and looks great. Based on three different items, I would definitely recommend and purchase again from SimpliHome. It is a plus that they sell through Amazon, since that alleviates any concerns about returns, should that ever be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wood table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wood table. Unfortunately it arrived broken. Because of the visible damage to one piece of the table, I think it was used and repackaged. If it didn’t arrive broken and used, I’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, needs better quality control
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid wood but the drawer needed some work to get it to open and close. The slides were too big and the screws were also oversized on the hardware kit. They should have screws that actually recessed in the slide. The screws sat too high and would catch and keep the drawer from opening. Such a simple fix that I shouldn't have to be doing right put of the box. Good price tho
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: Not much real wood, scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking piece, but we were disappointed to see how much of it is MDF, not solid wood as expected. As a result, it scratches very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Part "c" came broken, i went through the process to get certain peice replaced but still haven't heard back from seller a week later, ill have to call Amazon direct. Otherwise a nice piece .... As we bought the matching coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: MORGAN_REESE

customer_reviews.title: ... was fairly simple to put together and is a good, heavy quality
customer_reviews.text: Item was a little darker than pictured but it was fairly simple to put together and is a good, heavy quality. Just purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rustic end table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice finish. Wood is heavy and solid. Holes well drilled and good quality hardware made it easy to assemble. Looks more expensive than this price. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This table is wonderful. It is very sturdy and exactly what I was looking for. I went ahead and purchased another one for the other side of my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the product. Solid and looks very nice. Easy to assemble. Only issue was a piece of the shelf had cracked off in shipping but was able to fix good as nee
customer_reviews.author: Terry marsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect end table
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe it arrived so soon. Bottom shelf was cracked otherwise very pleased. Emailed manufacturer hopefully they can help me.
customer_reviews.author: gramx3

customer_reviews.title: They look just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I had a family member assemble for me they look great
customer_reviews.author: Pat C.

customer_reviews.title: Saved money ordering online and putting it together.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. Will save you some money if you don’t mind putting it together. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer mom

customer_reviews.title: It is a good looking, solid end table
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today and put it together in under 90 minutes. Now this is a miracle because my husband is away and I have never put anything together by myself. It is a good looking, solid end table. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tempestinateapot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pieces of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and was easily put together packed great! After buying two end tables and likening the quality so much we bought the bookcase it's beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven White

customer_reviews.title: Love this end table
customer_reviews.text: This end table looks amazing. Really loving this end table as it has such a nice looking finish / stain. The drawer works perfectly and the table is perfectly balanced / not wobbly. It looks great next to my dark wood bed. Really love this design and I think this collection is a real stylish one. It's a bit pricey but when you're getting wood it's going to be because it's that much better than anything compressed / fake. This is a real keeper.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

product_meta.title: Simpli Home Monroe End Table, 22 inch, Distressed Charcoal Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Distressed Charcoal BrownPair your sofa, accent chair or bed with the rustic contemporary Monroe End/Side Table. It features a single drawer and open bottom, perfect for storing and displaying treasured mementos. This striking End Table is made from beautiful and distinct Acacia with Distressed Charcoal Brown finish to highlight the grain and warmth of the wood. With its clean lines, shaker style paneling and Antique Brass pulls, the Monroe End/Side Table will enhance your room decor.Rustic Contemporary Style includes folding drawer pulls in an Antique Brass hardware finish. Assembly required. Efforts are made to reproduce accurate colors, variations in color may occur due to computer monitor and photography. At Simpli Home we believe in creating excellent, high quality products made from the finest materials at an affordable price. Every one of our products come with a 1-year warranty and easy returns if you are not satisfied.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 22" D x 22" W x 22" H
SOLID WOOD: Handcrafted with care using the finest quality Acacia Hardwood
HAND FINISHED with a Distressed Charcoal Brown stain and a protective NC lacquer coating to accentuate and highlight the grain and the uniqueness of each piece of furniture
MULTIPURPOSE TABLE can be used as an end table or side table. Looks great in your living room, great room, condo or bedroom.Weight Capacity:35 lbs
Features one drawer with metal drawer glides and large open shelf for plenty of storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
